column2: BlackRock says Italy's regulator dismisses charges over Saipem share sale MILAN
column3: July 27 Italian market regulator Consob has dismissed all charges against fund group BlackRock  and one of its managers over the alleged use of insider information to sell shares in Saipem in 2013
